00025 #ifndef _PHYSICS_JOINT_
00026 #define _PHYSICS_JOINT_
00027 
00028 #include <physics/physics>
00029 #include <physics/Constraint>
00030 #include <physics/Motor>
00031 #include <physics/Body>
00032 
00033 
00034 namespace physics {
00035 
00036 
00037 class Joint : virtual public Constraint 
00038 {
00039 public:
00040   Joint() {}
00041   virtual ~Joint() {}
00042 
00043   virtual void attach(ref<Body> body1, ref<Body> body2) = 0; ///< attach this joint to two bodies
00044   virtual ref<Body>       getBody(Int index) = 0;       ///< get Body (index is 1 or 2); returns null if unattached
00045   virtual ref<const Body> getBody(Int index) const = 0;
00046 
00047   virtual void attachMotor(Int dof, ref<Motor> motor) = 0; ///< attach Motor to dof n, or remove if motor==0
00048   virtual ref<Motor>       getMotor(Int dof) = 0;          ///< get Motor on dof n, or 0 if none
00049   virtual ref<const Motor> getMotor(Int dof) const = 0;
00050 };
00051 
00052 
00053 } // physics
00054 
00055 #endif
